direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve IP restriction management for sub-account API keys, but one retrieves the restriction and the other deletes IP addresses from the list.
Both methods handle IP restriction settings for sub-account API keys, with one retrieving the current restriction and the other updating it.
Both methods access and modify sub-account settings, though they handle different aspects (IP restriction vs. margin account enablement).
